title: 128bit keys
extract: In cryptography, key size or key length is the number of bits in a key used by a cryptographic algorithm (such as a cipher). ... For instance, Triple DES was designed to have a 168 bit key, but an attack of complexity 2112 is now known (i.e., Triple DES has 112 bits of security).
extract_html: In cryptography, key size or key length is the number of bits in a key used by a cryptographic algorithm (such as a cipher). ... For instance, Triple DES was designed to have a 168 bit key, but an attack of complexity 2112 is now known (i.e., Triple DES has 112 bits of security).
